    FRAMES NO FRAMES

    Cmp3\Source

    Interface SourceInterface

    All Known Implementing Classes:

    SourceAbstract
    public interface SourceInterface

    A Source does following:
    - fetching the data from the source (db, file from filesystem, http, ...) - detecting the content type (see ContentType) - might be set by configuration - processes content - returns content object

    Method Summary

     ContentInterface GetContent()
     ContentInterface Process()

    Method Detail

    GetContent

    public ContentInterface GetContent()

    Returns an content object

    Process

    public ContentInterface Process()

    Fetch and preprocess source content
